sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Login.css"; // Reuse the same neumorphic styling const PaymentPage = () => { // States const [fullName, setFullName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [age, setAge] = useState(""); const [cardName, setCardName] = useState(""); const [cardNumber, setCardNumber] = useState(""); const [expiry, setExpiry] = useState(""); const [cvv, setCvv] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const basePrice = 108.99; const tax = 8.25; const total = (basePrice + tax).toFixed(2); // Submit handler const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!fullName || !email || !age || !cardName || !cardNumber || !expiry || !cvv) { setMessage("⚠️ Please fill in all required fields."); return; } setMessage("✅ Payment successful! Thank you for booking with LiftOff."); }; return (
{/* Hide scrollbar for WebKit browsers */} {/* PASSENGER INFO SECTION */}

Passenger Information

Please enter passenger details below.

{/* Full Name */}
setFullName(e.target.value)} />
{/* Age */}
setAge(e.target.value)} />
{/* Email */}
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
{/* PAYMENT INFO SECTION */}

Payment Information

Enter your payment details below.

{/* Name on Card */}
setCardName(e.target.value)} />
{/* Card Number */}
setCardNumber(e.target.value)} />
{/* Expiration and CVV */}
setExpiry(e.target.value)} />
setCvv(e.target.value)} />
{/* FLIGHT INFORMATION SECTION */}

Flight Information

Review your trip details before confirming.

{/* Flight Name and Price */}

Boston (BSTN) → Vermont (VRMNT)

${basePrice}

Flight Number: LF234

Airline: LiftOff Airlines

Departure: Nov 10, 2025 - 8:45 AM

Number of Passengers: 1

Seat Number: 12A

{/* ✅ COMPLETE SUMMARY SECTION */}

Complete Summary

Please review your booking information before final confirmation.

Passenger

Name: {fullName || "—"}

Age: {age || "—"}

Seat Number: 12A

Flight

Flight Number: LF234

Airline: LiftOff Airlines

Route: Boston (BSTN) → Vermont (VRMNT)

Departure: Nov 10, 2025 - 8:45 AM

Email: {email || "—"}

Amount to Pay

Base Fare: ${basePrice}
Tax: ${tax}
Total: ${total}

{/* Confirmation Checkboxes */}
{message && (

{message}

)}
); }; export default PaymentPage;
